Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: Adding on to the pervious comment that summed it up quite well. 1310 is with literally zero activity that's just what your body needs to function if you are doing any walking, exercise, cleaning the house or just generally not sleeping you'll be burning more than that.

Author: finickytrashpanda
Text: Yes, if your TDEE is 1310, if you eat an average of 1310cal per day, you will neither gain nor lose weight. You could gain water/food weight in the short-term though depending on what you ate and how it differed from your normal eating habits making the scale say you gained weight when you didnâ€™t actually.
